attributes.action: STOP proposed  housing development at Dunsfold Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal for a so called 'Eco Town' at Dunsfold Park must be stopped. The site is mostly greenfield and the increased emissions from thousands more cars along already heavily congested Surrey roads will do nothing for the environment. The local infrastructure simply cannot sustain a development of this size.
